name: brazil-open-data
notes: The Brazilian Open Data Portal is a tool provided by the government for all to find and use data and information public. The portal stands for simplicity and organization so that you can easily find the data and information you need. The portal also aims to promote dialogue between social actors and the government to think the best use of data in favor of a better society.
title: Brazil Open Data
